Package com.ibm.rest

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.rest.AdminController
@CrossOrigin @RestController @RequestMapping("/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
REST controller for handling Admin-related operations.

    • saveAdmin

      @PostMapping(path="/add", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> saveAdmin(@RequestBody Admin admin)
      Endpoint for adding a new admin. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/add
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin object to be added
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the response message and HTTP status

    • getAllAdmins

      @GetMapping(path="/all", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Admin>> getAllAdmins()
      Endpoint for retrieving all admins. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/all
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of all admins and HTTP status

    • getAdminById

      @GetMapping(path="/id/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Admin> getAdminById(@PathVariable int id)
      Endpoint for retrieving an admin by ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the admin
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the admin object and HTTP status

    • getAdminByEmail

      @GetMapping(path="/email/{email}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Admin> getAdminByEmail(@PathVariable String email)
      Endpoint for retrieving an admin by email. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/email/{email}
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the admin
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the admin object and HTTP status

    • deleteAdmin

      @DeleteMapping(path="/remove/id/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteAdmin(@PathVariable int id)
      Endpoint for deleting an admin by ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/remove/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the admin to be deleted
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the response message and HTTP status

    • authenticateAdmin

      @PostMapping(path="/login", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> authenticateAdmin(@RequestBody AdminLogin a)
      Endpoint for authenticating an admin. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/login
      Parameters:
      a - the AdminLogin object containing the email and password
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the authentication token or unauthorized status
